introduction: Commons Mass Description is a tool that allows user to describe pictures and multimedia at Wikimedia Commons en masse without having to edit each image manually. You can find more at its Wikimedia Commons page.
introduction-bugs: If you find any bugs in this tool, please feel free to create a task at Wikimedia Phabricator.
